<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wave the Flag](/Feats.aspx?ID=3621) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 81</row>

**Archetype** [Cavalier](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=53)

**Prerequisites**
[Cavalier's Banner](/Feats.aspx?ID=1920)

**Access**
Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat.

</column>

---

You wave your banner, inspiring allies to throw off the shackles of fear. Each ally presently benefiting from your Cavalier's Banner feat reduces their current [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition by 1 and can choose to immediately attempt a new saving throw against any one [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effect currently affecting them. Regardless of the result, any ally that attempts a save is temporarily immune to Wave the Flag for 10 minutes.
